entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:36 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 4:00 PM EST Friday 30 December 2022
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Dewpoint: 3.8°C
Wind: SSE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Showers or drizzle. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.

entry.title: Saturday: Showers or drizzle. Temperature falling to plus 4 in the afternoon.
